vote.title: To Celebrate the 30th Anniversary of Mozart’s Bakery and Event Space
vote.description:
Title
 
To Celebrate the 30th Anniversary of Mozart’s Bakery and Event Space
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, located on High Street, Mozart’s is a classic Clintonville bakery, café, and event space that prides itself on serving authentic Austrian food and supporting local fundraising and enrichment within their community; and
 
WHEREAS, Doris and Anand Saha moved to Columbus from Austria in 1995, hoping to bring a taste of Vienna to their new neighborhood of Clintonville. Drawing on years of experience as chefs in hotels and European restaurants, the Sahas opened Mozart’s Bakery and Piano Café at 2885 North High Street; and 
 
WHEREAS, classical music has always been a central focus at Mozart’s-the café features live piano music and hosts an annual gala in celebration of the birth of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, the restaurant’s inspiration; and 
 
WHEREAS, Mozart’s has played an instrumental role in revitalizing local events, such as the annual Clintonville Fourth of July celebration and the Whetstone Park of Roses Concert Series; and 
 
WHEREAS, the café supports many schools, nonprofits, and other community organizations both large and small, generating more than $750,000 for fundraising efforts over the past 30 years. The Sahas have also founded two nonprofits benefiting Clintonville youth: Million Lego for Kids and Young Mozart Scholars Fund; and
 
WHEREAS, the Sahas purchased the Beechwold in 2012 as the future home for Mozart’s, opening the new space on North High Street in July 2013; and 
 
WHEREAS, in the past three decades, Mozart’s has grown from a small pastry shop to a full-fledged bakery, café, and event space hosting weddings, showers, fundraisers, memorials and so much more; now, therefore 
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: 
that this Council celebrates the 30th Anniversary of Mozart’s Bakery and Event Space and the café’s many contributions to the people within its community.
